quiz.question: exuberant ___________
quiz.explanation: 充满活力的, 充满活力的个性. She had an exuberant personality that lit up every room. 她有充满活力的个性,照亮了每个房间。

quiz.question: flagrant ____
quiz.explanation: 明目张胆的, 明目张胆的犯规. The player committed a flagrant foul in the game. 球员在比赛中犯了明目张胆的犯规。

quiz.question: _________ vagrant
quiz.explanation: 流浪者, 流浪的流浪者. A wandering vagrant slept in the doorway. 一个流浪的流浪者睡在门口。

quiz.question: arrant ________
quiz.explanation: 彻头彻尾的, 彻头彻尾的胡说. His claim was arrant nonsense. 他的说法是彻头彻尾的胡说。

quiz.question: ___ currant
quiz.explanation: 醋栗, 红醋栗. She made jam from red currants. 她用红醋栗做果酱。

quiz.question: ___ entrant
quiz.explanation: 参赛者, 新参赛者. The new entrant showed great promise. 新参赛者显示出巨大的潜力。

quiz.question: pheasant _______
quiz.explanation: 野鸡, 野鸡狩猎. The aristocrats enjoyed pheasant hunting in autumn. 贵族们在秋天享受野鸡狩猎。

quiz.question: resultant _____
quiz.explanation: 合成的, 合成的力. The resultant force determined the object's motion. 合成的力决定了物体的运动。

quiz.question: exultant ______
quiz.explanation: 欢欣鼓舞的, 欢欣鼓舞的欢呼. Exultant cheers erupted when the team won. 当球队获胜时爆发了欢欣鼓舞的欢呼。

quiz.question: contestant ______
quiz.explanation: 参赛者, 参赛者获胜者. The contestant emerged as the winner. 参赛者成为获胜者。

quiz.question: buoyant ____
quiz.explanation: 愉快的, 愉快的心情. She was in a buoyant mood after the good news. 好消息后她心情愉快。

quiz.question: complacent ________
quiz.explanation: 自满的, 自满的态度. His complacent attitude prevented improvement. 他自满的态度阻碍了改进。

quiz.question: indecent ________
quiz.explanation: 不雅的, 不雅的暴露. He was arrested for indecent exposure. 他因不雅暴露而被逮捕。

quiz.question: ________ ascent
quiz.explanation: 攀登, 山地攀登. The mountain ascent took three days. 山地攀登花了三天。

quiz.question: incandescent ____
quiz.explanation: 白炽的, 白炽灯. The old incandescent lamp was replaced with LED. 旧的白炽灯被LED取代。

quiz.question: opalescent _____
quiz.explanation: 乳白色的, 乳白色的光泽. The pearl had a beautiful opalescent sheen. 珍珠有美丽的乳白色光泽。

quiz.question: convalescent _______
quiz.explanation: 康复中的, 康复中的病人. The convalescent patient was recovering well. 康复中的病人恢复得很好。

quiz.question: reminiscent ____
quiz.explanation: 怀旧的, 怀旧的语气. She spoke in a reminiscent tone about her childhood. 她用怀旧的语气谈论童年。

quiz.question: translucent _____
quiz.explanation: 半透明的, 半透明的玻璃. The translucent glass allowed soft light through. 半透明的玻璃让柔和的光透过。

quiz.question: resplendent ______
quiz.explanation: 华丽的, 华丽的宫殿. The resplendent palace gleamed in the sunlight. 华丽的宫殿在阳光下闪闪发光。

quiz.question: _______ gent
quiz.explanation: 绅士, 完美的绅士. He was a perfect gentleman in every way. 他在各方面都是完美的绅士。

quiz.question: indulgent ______
quiz.explanation: 纵容的, 纵容的父母. The indulgent parent spoiled the child. 纵容的父母宠坏了孩子。

quiz.question: _______ detergent
quiz.explanation: 洗涤剂, 洗衣洗涤剂. She bought eco-friendly laundry detergent. 她买了环保的洗衣洗涤剂。

quiz.question: obedient ___
quiz.explanation: 服从的, 服从的狗. The obedient dog followed every command. 服从的狗遵循每一个命令。

quiz.question: _____ relent
quiz.explanation: 缓和, 风暴缓和. The storm finally began to relent at dawn. 风暴终于在黎明时开始缓和。

quiz.question: insolent ______
quiz.explanation: 无礼的, 无礼的评论. His insolent remark angered the teacher. 他无礼的评论激怒了老师。

quiz.question: malevolent ______
quiz.explanation: 恶意的, 恶意的精神. The malevolent spirit haunted the old mansion. 恶意的精神在老豪宅里出没。

quiz.question: turbulent _____
quiz.explanation: 动荡的, 动荡的海浪. Turbulent waves rocked the small boat. 动荡的海浪摇晃着小船。

quiz.question: corpulent ___
quiz.explanation: 肥胖的, 肥胖的男人. The corpulent man struggled to climb stairs. 肥胖的男人费力地爬楼梯。

quiz.question: lament ____
quiz.explanation: 哀悼, 哀悼损失. She would lament the loss of her friend. 她会哀悼朋友的损失。

quiz.question: ____ temperament
quiz.explanation: 性情, 平静的性情. The horse had a calm temperament. 这匹马有平静的性情。

quiz.question: ______ estrangement
quiz.explanation: 疏远, 家庭疏远. The family estrangement lasted for years. 家庭疏远持续了多年。

quiz.question: vehement ________
quiz.explanation: 激烈的, 激烈的争论. They had a vehement argument about politics. 他们就政治进行了激烈的争论。

quiz.question: ______ battlement
quiz.explanation: 城垛, 城堡城垛. Guards patrolled along the castle battlements. 卫兵沿着城堡城垛巡逻。

quiz.question: _____ __ puzzlement
quiz.explanation: 困惑, 困惑状态. He looked at her in a state of puzzlement. 他困惑地看着她。

quiz.question: ______ disfigurement
quiz.explanation: 毁容, 面部毁容. The accident caused severe facial disfigurement. 事故造成了严重的面部毁容。

quiz.question: understatement _____
quiz.explanation: 轻描淡写, 轻描淡写幽默. British comedy relies on understatement humor. 英国喜剧依赖于轻描淡写幽默。

quiz.question: ____ figment
quiz.explanation: 虚构, 纯粹的虚构. The ghost was a mere figment of imagination. 鬼魂是纯粹的想象虚构。

quiz.question: astonishment _____
quiz.explanation: 惊讶, 惊讶的人群. The crowd gasped in astonishment at the trick. 人群对这个把戏惊讶地倒抽气。

quiz.question: concealment ______
quiz.explanation: 隐藏, 隐藏装置. The spy used a concealment device for documents. 间谍使用隐藏装置存放文件。

quiz.question: _____ consignment
quiz.explanation: 托运, 货物托运. The goods consignment arrived on schedule. 货物托运按时到达。

quiz.question: _____ bewilderment
quiz.explanation: 困惑, 完全的困惑. He stared in utter bewilderment at the scene. 他完全困惑地盯着现场。

quiz.question: _____ __ wonderment
quiz.explanation: 惊奇, 惊奇感. The child watched with a sense of wonderment. 孩子带着惊奇感观看。

quiz.question: ________ torment
quiz.explanation: 折磨, 持续的折磨. The pain was a constant torment. 疼痛是持续的折磨。

quiz.question: _____ enchantment
quiz.explanation: 魔法, 仙女魔法. The fairy enchantment broke at midnight. 仙女魔法在午夜打破。

quiz.question: ____ contentment
quiz.explanation: 满足, 深深的满足. He felt deep contentment with his life. 他对自己的生活感到深深的满足。

quiz.question: impertinent _____
quiz.explanation: 无礼的, 无礼的孩子. The impertinent child talked back to adults. 无礼的孩子顶撞成年人。

quiz.question: ____ assent
quiz.explanation: 同意, 给予同意. The committee will give assent to the proposal. 委员会将给予提案同意。

quiz.question: ____ portent
quiz.explanation: 预兆, 不祥的预兆. The dark clouds were a portent of the storm. 乌云是风暴的预兆。

quiz.question: ________ delinquent
quiz.explanation: 少年犯, 少年犯. The juvenile delinquent was sent to reform school. 少年犯被送到少年管教所。

quiz.question: fervent _________
quiz.explanation: 热情的, 热情的支持者. He was a fervent supporter of the cause. 他是这项事业的热情支持者。

quiz.question: repaint ____
quiz.explanation: 重新粉刷, 重新粉刷墙壁. They decided to repaint the wall white. 他们决定把墙壁重新粉刷成白色。

quiz.question: ______ taint
quiz.explanation: 污染, 毒药污染. The water had a poison taint from chemicals. 水因化学物质而有毒药污染。

quiz.question: ______ feint
quiz.explanation: 佯攻, 拳击佯攻. The boxer used a clever feint to confuse his opponent. 拳击手用巧妙的佯攻迷惑对手。

quiz.question: ___ glint
quiz.explanation: 闪光, 太阳闪光. A sun glint reflected off the metal surface. 太阳闪光从金属表面反射。

quiz.question: ____ splint
quiz.explanation: 夹板, 木夹板. The doctor applied a wood splint to the broken arm. 医生给断臂使用了木夹板。

quiz.question: disjoint ______
quiz.explanation: 不连贯的, 不连贯的努力. Their disjoint efforts lacked coordination. 他们不连贯的努力缺乏协调。

quiz.question: newsprint _____
quiz.explanation: 新闻纸, 新闻纸. Newspapers are printed on newsprint paper. 报纸印刷在新闻纸上。

quiz.question: ___ squint
quiz.explanation: 斜视, 眼睛斜视. He had to squint his eyes in the bright sun. 他在强烈的阳光下不得不眯起眼睛。

quiz.question: ____ affront
quiz.explanation: 侮辱, 公开侮辱. The comment was an open affront to his dignity. 这个评论是对他尊严的公开侮辱。

quiz.question: gaunt ______
quiz.explanation: 憔悴的, 憔悴的身影. The gaunt figure looked malnourished. 憔悴的身影看起来营养不良。

quiz.question: haunt _____
quiz.explanation: 闹鬼, 闹鬼的房子. Ghosts were said to haunt the old house. 据说鬼魂在老房子里出没。

quiz.question: _______ jaunt
quiz.explanation: 短途旅行, 周末短途旅行. They took a weekend jaunt to the coast. 他们进行了一次周末海岸短途旅行。

quiz.question: _____ taunt
quiz.explanation: 嘲弄, 愤怒的嘲弄. The bully's angry taunts hurt the child. 恶霸愤怒的嘲弄伤害了孩子。

quiz.question: __________ manhunt
quiz.explanation: 搜捕, 全国性搜捕. A nationwide manhunt was launched for the fugitive. 针对逃犯发起了全国性搜捕。

quiz.question: _____ shunt
quiz.explanation: 调度, 火车调度. Workers would shunt train cars to different tracks. 工人会将火车车厢调度到不同的轨道。

quiz.question: ____ recount
quiz.explanation: 重新计算, 选票重新计算. Officials ordered a vote recount due to irregularities. 由于违规,官员下令进行选票重新计算。

quiz.question: ____ fount
quiz.explanation: 源泉, 圣泉. Pilgrims drank from the holy fount. 朝圣者从圣泉中喝水。

quiz.question: dismount _____
quiz.explanation: 下马, 下马. The rider had to dismount from the horse. 骑手必须从马上下来。

quiz.question: grunt ____
quiz.explanation: 繁重工作, 繁重工作. Interns often do grunt work at the office. 实习生经常在办公室做繁重工作。

quiz.question: ____ mascot
quiz.explanation: 吉祥物, 队吉祥物. The team mascot entertained fans during breaks. 队吉祥物在休息时娱乐球迷。

quiz.question: ____ bloodshot
quiz.explanation: 充血的, 充血的眼睛. His eyes were bloodshot from lack of sleep. 他的眼睛因缺乏睡眠而充血。

quiz.question: _____ upshot
quiz.explanation: 结果, 最终结果. The final upshot was a complete success. 最终结果是完全成功。

quiz.question: ______ earshot
quiz.explanation: 听力范围, 在听力范围内. Don't speak until they're within earshot. 直到他们在听力范围内才说话。

quiz.question: ____ _ jot
quiz.explanation: 一点, 做一点记录. Let me make a jot of that information. 让我做一点那个信息的记录。

quiz.question: ___ blot
quiz.explanation: 污渍, 墨水污渍. An ink blot stained the paper. 墨水污渍弄脏了纸。

quiz.question: scoot ____
quiz.explanation: 快速移动, 快速移动离开. The children would scoot away when called for dinner. 孩子们被叫吃晚饭时会快速移动离开。

quiz.question: underfoot _____
quiz.explanation: 脚下, 脚下的杂草. Underfoot weeds made walking difficult. 脚下的杂草使行走困难。

quiz.question: ___ hoot
quiz.explanation: 叫声, 猫头鹰叫声. The owl's hoot echoed through the forest. 猫头鹰的叫声在森林中回荡。

quiz.question: uproot ____
quiz.explanation: 连根拔起, 连根拔起树. The hurricane would uproot large trees. 飓风会连根拔起大树。

quiz.question: _____ soot
quiz.explanation: 烟灰, 黑色烟灰. Black soot covered the chimney inside. 黑色烟灰覆盖了烟囱内部。

quiz.question: repot _____
quiz.explanation: 换盆, 换盆植物. She needed to repot the plant into a larger container. 她需要把植物换盆到更大的容器。

quiz.question: _____ crackpot
quiz.explanation: 怪人, 疯狂的怪人. That crazy crackpot believes in wild conspiracy theories. 那个疯狂的怪人相信疯狂的阴谋论。

quiz.question: inkpot ____
quiz.explanation: 墨水瓶, 墨水瓶井. The old desk had an inkpot well for fountain pens. 旧书桌有一个用于钢笔的墨水瓶井。

quiz.question: tinpot ________
quiz.explanation: 微不足道的, 微不足道的独裁者. The tinpot dictator ruled with an iron fist. 微不足道的独裁者用铁腕统治。

quiz.question: _____ trot
quiz.explanation: 小跑, 马小跑. The horse began to trot along the trail. 马开始沿着小径小跑。

quiz.question: rapt _________
quiz.explanation: 全神贯注的, 全神贯注的注意. The audience listened with rapt attention. 观众全神贯注地倾听。

quiz.question: nondescript ___
quiz.explanation: 平凡的, 平凡的男人. A nondescript man stood in the corner. 一个平凡的男人站在角落里。

quiz.question: unkempt ____
quiz.explanation: 蓬乱的, 蓬乱的头发. His unkempt hair needed a good brushing. 他蓬乱的头发需要好好梳理。

quiz.question: tempt ____
quiz.explanation: 诱惑, 诱惑命运. Don't tempt fate by taking unnecessary risks. 不要通过承担不必要的风险来诱惑命运。

quiz.question: abrupt ____
quiz.explanation: 突然的, 突然的停止. The car came to an abrupt stop. 汽车突然停了下来。

quiz.question: disrupt _______
quiz.explanation: 破坏, 破坏服务. Technical issues would disrupt the phone service. 技术问题会破坏电话服务。

quiz.question: ____ braggart
quiz.explanation: 吹牛者, 大声的吹牛者. The loud braggart boasted about his achievements. 大声的吹牛者吹嘘他的成就。

quiz.question: _____ tart
quiz.explanation: 果馅饼, 甜果馅饼. She baked a sweet fruit tart for dessert. 她烤了一个甜水果馅饼作为甜点。

quiz.question: ____ wart
quiz.explanation: 疣, 皮肤疣. A skin wart appeared on his finger. 一个皮肤疣出现在他的手指上。

quiz.question: thwart _____
quiz.explanation: 阻挠, 阻挠计划. Bad weather would thwart their travel plans. 恶劣天气会阻挠他们的旅行计划。

quiz.question: _____ sherbert
quiz.explanation: 果汁冰糕, 柠檬果汁冰糕. The refreshing lemon sherbert was perfect for summer. 清爽的柠檬果汁冰糕非常适合夏天。

quiz.question: disconcert ________
quiz.explanation: 使不安, 使观众不安. The unexpected question would disconcert the audience. 意外的问题会使观众不安。

quiz.question: avert ________
quiz.explanation: 避免, 避免灾难. Quick action helped avert a major disaster. 快速行动帮助避免了重大灾难。

quiz.question: revert ____
quiz.explanation: 恢复, 恢复回去. The settings will revert back to default. 设置将恢复回默认值。
